name: Zara Robot
description: A Simple Group Manager Bot using Pyrogram, Telethon. Specially This is working with firebase database.

API_ID.description: Your APP ID (You can get this value from my.telegram.org)

API_HASH.description: Your API Hash (You can get this value from my.telegram.org)

FDBURL.description: Your Firebase DataBase Url. (You can get this value from console.firebase.google.com)

LOG_CHNL.description: Your Log Channel Id start with -100. (Make sure bot is admin in channel)

INLINE_THUMB.description: Enter BOT Inline Thumbnail link. Upload your image to telegra.ph & put link here.

INLINE_ABOUT_THUMB.description: Enter Inline About Thumbnail. Upload your image to telegra.ph & put link here.
